basics.name: Patrick (Yong Jae) Kwon
basics.label: Deep Learning Researcher
basics.summary: Ph.D. student in Computer Science at the University of Central Florida focusing on generative AI, spatial intelligence, and controllable image/video generation.

work.name: Naver Webtoon AI
work.summary: Worked on large-scale generative models for images, videos, and 3D assets; developed internal diffusion pipelines and multimodal tooling.
highlights: Built internal Python library for image, video, and 3D content generation using state-of-the-art diffusion models.
Developed AI Studio, a user-friendly generative framework for creation and inpainting.
Collaborated with SNU Visual Computing Lab on CHUPA (ICCV 2023 Oral, ECCV 2024 Oral).

work.name: Deepbrain AI
work.summary: Worked on deepfake detection and large-scale video dataset construction.
highlights: Developed KoDF, a major Korean deepfake detection dataset.
First-author contribution to KoDF paper accepted at ICCV 2021.

work.name: Columbia University – CGUI Lab
work.summary: Worked on Augmented Reality interfaces for medical imaging and intraoral scanning.
highlights: Contributed to AR-assisted intraoral scanning research (Journal of Prosthodontics 2024).

work.name: Emadri
work.summary: Designed recommendation systems for recommending packing list items for travelers.

work.name: Krafton
work.summary: Provided 20+ data analysis papers on TERA, Krafton’s leading MMORPG Title.

publications.name: GraspDiffusion: Synthesizing Realistic Whole-body Hand-Object Interaction
publications.summary: Introduces a diffusion-based method for generating realistic, full-body hand-object interactions.

publications.name: Beyond the Contact: Discovering Comprehensive Affordance for 3D Objects from Pre-trained 2D Diffusion Models
publications.summary: Presents a method for affordance discovery using pretrained 2D diffusion models.

publications.name: Augmented-Reality-Assisted Intraoral Scanning: A Proof-of-Concept Study
publications.summary: Demonstrates the use of AR to enhance intraoral scanning workflows.

publications.name: Chupa: Carving 3D Clothed Humans from Skinned Shape Priors Using 2D Diffusion Probabilistic Models
publications.summary: Proposes a diffusion-driven pipeline for 3D clothed human reconstruction.

publications.name: LPMM: Intuitive Pose Control for Neural Talking-Head Model via Landmark-Parameter Morphable Model
Interactive Cartoonization with Controllable Perceptual Factors
publications.summary: Presents a controllable cartoonization framework using perceptual factor modulation.

publications.name: KoDF: A Large-scale Korean DeepFake Detection Dataset
publications.summary: Introduces a large-scale deepfake detection dataset focused on Asian subjects.

projects.name: AI Photocard
projects.summary: Internal Python library for generating images, videos, and 3D assets using diffusion models.

projects.name: AI Studio
projects.summary: User-friendly generative AI system enabling image creation and inpainting.

projects.name: ARIOS: AR-assisted Intraoral Scanning
projects.summary: Developed AR pipeline for improved intraoral scanning procedures.

projects.name: Chupa
projects.summary: Diffusion-based 3D human reconstruction pipeline developed with SNU Visual Computing Lab.

projects.name: KoDF Dataset
projects.summary: Large-scale Asian deepfake dataset with detection model.

projects.name: Pally: AR for Social Transition
projects.summary: Microsoft HoloLens + 5G project supporting social development for autistic children.

awards.title: ICCV Oral
awards.summary: Top 1.8% of submissions for CHUPA (ICCV 2023 Oral).

awards.title: IBM Call for Code Hackathon – 1st Place
